statements: SELECT * FROM artwork;
SELECT title, artist FROM artwork WHERE availability = true;
SELECT id, title, artist FROM artwork ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM artwork WHERE artist = 'Vincent Van Gogh';
SELECT id, location FROM artwork WHERE availability = false;
SELECT * FROM artwork WHERE availability = TRUE ORDER BY title ASC, artist DESC
SELECT id, title, artist FROM artwork WHERE location = 'Gallery'
SELECT artist, COUNT(*) AS total_artwork FROM artwork GROUP BY artist HAVING total_artwork > 1
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM artwork ORDER BY location
SELECT * FROM artwork WHERE title LIKE 'The%'
SELECT * FROM artworks WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT title, artist, location FROM artworks WHERE artist = 'Picasso';
SELECT id, title FROM artworks WHERE artist = 'Van Gogh' ORDER BY title DESC;
SELECT id, title, artist FROM artworks WHERE location = 'Museum' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM galleries WHERE location LIKE '%New York%' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, title, artist, location, availability FROM artworks WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT title, artist FROM artworks WHERE location IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM artworks WHERE artist = 'Picasso' AND availability = FALSE;
SELECT artist, COUNT(*) as total_artworks FROM artworks GROUP BY artist;
SELECT name, location, phone FROM galleries WHERE location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT * FROM Artworks
SELECT artwork_id, artwork_name, artist_name FROM Artworks
SELECT gallery_name, location FROM Galleries
SELECT * FROM Artists WHERE nationality = 'French'
SELECT artist_name, birth_year FROM Artists ORDER BY birth_year DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM Artworks WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT artist_name, artwork_name, location FROM Artworks WHERE location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT gallery_name, location, floor_count FROM Galleries ORDER BY floor_count DESC;
SELECT artist_name, nationality, birth_year FROM Artists WHERE birth_year > 1970 AND nationality = 'French';
SELECT * FROM Artworks WHERE location = 'Paris' AND availability = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM GalleryEmployee WHERE position = 'Manager';
SELECT artwork_id, title, author FROM Artwork WHERE available = true;
SELECT gallery_id, name, established_date FROM Gallery ORDER BY established_date DESC;
SELECT name, position FROM GalleryEmployee WHERE gallery_id = 3;
SELECT title, author, location FROM Artwork JOIN ArtworkLocation ON Artwork.artwork_id = ArtworkLocation.artwork_id WHERE floor = 1 AND position = 3;
SELECT * FROM Artwork WHERE available = TRUE;
SELECT title, author FROM Artwork WHERE location = 'Museum';
SELECT * FROM Gallery WHERE established_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT name, location, established_date FROM Gallery ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT title, author, name FROM Artwork JOIN Gallery ON ArtworkLocation.gallery_id = Gallery.gallery_id;
SELECT * FROM Artwork
SELECT title, artist, year FROM Artwork WHERE availability = true
SELECT title, year, location FROM Artwork ORDER BY year DESC
SELECT * FROM Gallery WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT name, opening_hours FROM Gallery
SELECT * FROM Artwork WHERE artist = 'Leonardo da Vinci';
SELECT title, year, availability FROM Artwork ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT a.title, a.artist, s.price FROM Artwork a JOIN ArtworkSale s ON a.artwork_id = s.artwork_id WHERE s.price > 1000;
SELECT g.name, COUNT(al.artwork_id) AS total_artwork FROM Gallery g LEFT JOIN ArtworkLocation al ON g.gallery_id = al.location_id GROUP BY g.name;
SELECT a.title, ah.event_description FROM Artwork a LEFT JOIN ArtworkHistory ah ON a.artwork_id = ah.artwork_id WHERE ah.event_date >= '2022-01-01';
